properties.name: rate-limit.whitelist-ips
properties.description: List of client IPs to exclude from rate limiting

properties.name: rate-limit.header-prefix
properties.description: Prefix used for rate limit headers

properties.name: rate-limit.capacity
properties.description: Number of tokens (capacity) in the token bucket

properties.name: rate-limit.refill-tokens
properties.description: Number of tokens added on each refill interval

properties.name: rate-limit.cache-max-size
properties.description: Maximum number of buckets to keep in the cache

properties.name: rate-limit.cache-expire-hours
properties.description: Cache expiry time in hours for idle buckets
